sentence.Network_en: He said he wanted a color-blind government where everybody's treated the same.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说想要一个对所有人一视同仁、没有种族偏见的政府。

sentence.Network_en: Since he was color blind, he favored large, showy flowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为他是色盲，所以他喜爱大朵艳丽的花。

sentence.Network_en: People who cannot distinguish between colors are said to be color - blind .
sentence.Network_cn: 不能辨别颜色的人谓之 色盲.
